abstract: Advertising column; Kraft Heinz chose not to publicize recipe changes that removed artificial preservatives from its popular boxed macaroni and cheese when alterations took effect in Dec 2015; company is now rolling out advertising campaign that emphasizes how change did not alter product's taste.

headline.print_headline: 50 Million Boxes Later, Kraft Reveals New Mac and Cheese
headline.main: Kraft Reveals Revamped Mac and Cheese, 50 Million Boxes Later

snippet: Last year Kraft reformulated its macaroni and cheese without artificial dyes or preservatives. Months later, the company told the public it had made the switch.
lead_paragraph: Last year Kraft reformulated its macaroni and cheese without artificial dyes or preservatives. Months later, the company told the public it had made the switch.
